action.title: Incredibles 2

action.overview: Framed and on the run, a former FBI agent must save his family from a blazing fire in the world's tallest building.
action.title: Skyscraper

action.overview: Thor is on the other side of the universe and finds himself in a race against time to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the prophecy of destruction to his homeworld and the end of Asgardian civilization, at the hands of an all-powerful new threat, the ruthless Hela.
action.title: Thor: Ragnarok
